languages.text:
This character is protected from within its Psyber-Raven. The first time in combat they should drop unconscious, somebody else from their retinue will drop unconscious instead. After that, this character restores {uip|LoreWarpWounds|b4bc75022f36428ab86485983e796a6b} Wounds.
When this effect procs, the Psyber-Raven also drops unconscious.

traits.locale_text:
This character is protected from within its Psyber-Raven. The first time in combat they should drop unconscious, somebody else from their retinue will drop unconscious instead. After that, this character restores {uip|LoreWarpWounds|b4bc75022f36428ab86485983e796a6b} Wounds.
When this effect procs, the Psyber-Raven also drops unconscious.

languages.text: This {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} is protected by their psyber-raven. When the Overseer suffers lethal damage for the first time in combat, that instance of damage is ignored and a random ally along with the psyber-raven fall {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g} instead. As a final gift, the psyber-raven restores {uip|LoreWarpWounds|b4bc75022f36428ab86485983e796a6b} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} to its Overseer.
languages.original_text: Этого {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}надзирателя{/g} защищает псайберворон. Получив смертельный урон впервые за бой, надзиратель его игнорирует. Вместо него случайный союзник, а также псайберворон падают {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}без сознания{/g}. В качестве последнего дара псайберворон восстанавливает своему надзирателю {uip|LoreWarpWounds|b4bc75022f36428ab86485983e796a6b} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}.

Этого {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}надзирателя{/g} защищает псайберворон. Получив смертельный урон впервые за бой, надзиратель его игнорирует. Вместо него случайный союзник, а также псайберворон падают {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}без сознания{/g}. В качестве последнего дара псайберворон восстанавливает своему надзирателю {uip|LoreWarpWounds|b4bc75022f36428ab86485983e796a6b} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}.

languages.text: 这位{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}监察官{/g}受到生化渡鸦的保护。当监察官在战斗中首次承受致命伤害时，会无视此次承受的伤害，而生化渡鸦与一位随机盟友会陷入昏迷状态。当生化渡鸦由于此效果陷入{g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}昏迷{/g}状态时，会为主人恢复{uip|LoreWarpWounds|b4bc75022f36428ab86485983e796a6b}点{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，作为最后的临别赠礼。
languages.original_text: This {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} is protected by their psyber-raven. When the Overseer suffers lethal damage for the first time in combat, that instance of damage is ignored and a random ally along with the psyber-raven fall {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g} instead. As a final gift, the psyber-raven restores {uip|LoreWarpWounds|b4bc75022f36428ab86485983e796a6b} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} to its Overseer.

traits.locale_text: 这位监察官受到生化渡鸦的保护。当监察官在战斗中首次承受致命伤害时，会无视此次承受的伤害，而生化渡鸦与一位随机盟友会陷入昏迷状态。当生化渡鸦由于此效果陷入昏迷状态时，会为主人恢复{uip|LoreWarpWounds|b4bc75022f36428ab86485983e796a6b}点生命值，作为最后的临别赠礼。
这位监察官受到生化渡鸦的保护。当监察官在战斗中首次承受致命伤害时，会无视此次承受的伤害，而生化渡鸦与一位随机盟友会陷入昏迷状态。当生化渡鸦由于此效果陷入昏迷状态时，会为主人恢复{uip|LoreWarpWounds|b4bc75022f36428ab86485983e796a6b}点生命值，作为最后的临别赠礼。

languages.text: Ce {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g} est protégé par sa psyber-corneille. Lorsqu'il subit des dégâts mortels pour la première fois au cours d'un combat, il les ignore et un allié aléatoire {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}perd connaissance{/g} à sa place, de même que la psyber-corneille. En guise de cadeau d'adieu, celle-ci restaure {uip|LoreWarpWounds|b4bc75022f36428ab86485983e796a6b} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} de son surveillant.
languages.original_text: This {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} is protected by their psyber-raven. When the Overseer suffers lethal damage for the first time in combat, that instance of damage is ignored and a random ally along with the psyber-raven fall {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g} instead. As a final gift, the psyber-raven restores {uip|LoreWarpWounds|b4bc75022f36428ab86485983e796a6b} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} to its Overseer.

traits.locale_text: Ce surveillant est protégé par sa psyber-corneille. Lorsqu'il subit des dégâts mortels pour la première fois au cours d'un combat, il les ignore et un allié aléatoire perd connaissance à sa place, de même que la psyber-corneille. En guise de cadeau d'adieu, celle-ci restaure {uip|LoreWarpWounds|b4bc75022f36428ab86485983e796a6b} blessures de son surveillant.

Ce surveillant est protégé par sa psyber-corneille. En guise de cadeau d'adieu, celle-ci restaure {uip|LoreWarpWounds|b4bc75022f36428ab86485983e796a6b} blessures de son surveillant.

Ce surveillant est protégé par sa psyber-corneille. Lorsqu'il subit des dégâts mortels pour la première fois au cours d'un combat, il les ignore et un allié aléatoire perd connaissance à sa place, de même que la psyber-corneille. En guise de cadeau d'adieu, celle-ci restaure {uip|LoreWarpWounds|b4bc75022f36428ab86485983e796a6b} blessures de son surveillant.

languages.text: Este {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g} está protegido por su psicocuervo. Cuando el supervisor sufre daño letal por primera vez en el combate, ese daño se ignora y, en su lugar, un aliado aleatorio y el psicocuervo caen {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}inconscientes{/g}. Como último regalo, el psicocuervo restaura {uip|LoreWarpWounds|b4bc75022f36428ab86485983e796a6b} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} a su supervisor.
languages.original_text: This {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} is protected by their psyber-raven. When the Overseer suffers lethal damage for the first time in combat, that instance of damage is ignored and a random ally along with the psyber-raven fall {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g} instead. As a final gift, the psyber-raven restores {uip|LoreWarpWounds|b4bc75022f36428ab86485983e796a6b} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} to its Overseer.

Este supervisor está protegido por su psicocuervo. Cuando el supervisor sufre daño letal por primera vez en el combate, ese daño se ignora y, en su lugar, un aliado aleatorio y el psicocuervo caen inconscientes. Como último regalo, el psicocuervo restaura {uip|LoreWarpWounds|b4bc75022f36428ab86485983e796a6b} heridas a su supervisor.

languages.text: この{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}監督官{/g}はサイバーレイヴンに守られている。監督官が戦闘で初めて致命的なダメージを受けた場合、そのダメージは無視され、代わりにランダムな味方とサイバーレイヴンが{g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}意識不明{/g}になる。最後のボーナスとして、サイバーレイヴンは監督官の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}を{uip|LoreWarpWounds|b4bc75022f36428ab86485983e796a6b}回復する。
languages.original_text: This {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} is protected by their psyber-raven. When the Overseer suffers lethal damage for the first time in combat, that instance of damage is ignored and a random ally along with the psyber-raven fall {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g} instead. As a final gift, the psyber-raven restores {uip|LoreWarpWounds|b4bc75022f36428ab86485983e796a6b} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} to its Overseer.

traits.locale_text: この監督官はサイバーレイヴンに守られている。監督官が戦闘で初めて致命的なダメージを受けた場合、そのダメージは無視され、代わりにランダムな味方とサイバーレイヴンが意識不明になる。最後のボーナスとして、サイバーレイヴンは監督官の傷を{uip|LoreWarpWounds|b4bc75022f36428ab86485983e796a6b}回復する。
この監督官はサイバーレイヴンに守られている。監督官が戦闘で初めて致命的なダメージを受けた場合、そのダメージは無視され、代わりにランダムな味方とサイバーレイヴンが意識不明になる。最後のボーナスとして、サイバーレイヴンは監督官の傷を{uip|LoreWarpWounds|b4bc75022f36428ab86485983e796a6b}回復する。

languages.text: Bu {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g}, ruhsiber kuzgunu tarafından korunur. Gözetmen, çatışmada ilk kez ölümcül hasar aldığında bu hasar silsilesi yok sayılır ve onun yerine rastgele bir dost birim ile ruhsiber kuzgun {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}baygın{/g} düşer. Ruhsiber kuzgun, son bir armağan olarak Gözetmen'inin {uip|LoreWarpWounds|b4bc75022f36428ab86485983e796a6b} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanını tazeler.
languages.original_text: This {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} is protected by their psyber-raven. When the Overseer suffers lethal damage for the first time in combat, that instance of damage is ignored and a random ally along with the psyber-raven fall {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g} instead. As a final gift, the psyber-raven restores {uip|LoreWarpWounds|b4bc75022f36428ab86485983e796a6b} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} to its Overseer.

Ruhsiber kuzgun, son bir armağan olarak Gözetmen'inin {uip|LoreWarpWounds|b4bc75022f36428ab86485983e796a6b} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanını tazeler.

Bu {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g}, ruhsiber kuzgunu tarafından korunur. Gözetmen, çatışmada ilk kez ölümcül hasar aldığında bu hasar silsilesi yok sayılır ve onun yerine rastgele bir dost birim ile ruhsiber kuzgun baygın düşer. Ruhsiber kuzgun, son bir armağan olarak Gözetmen'inin {uip|LoreWarpWounds|b4bc75022f36428ab86485983e796a6b} sağlık puanını tazeler.

languages.text: Dieser {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Aufseher{/g} wird von seinem Psitech-Raben beschützt. Erleidet der Aufseher im Kampf erstmals tödlichen Schaden, wird diese Schadensinstanz ignoriert und ein zufälliger Verbündeter und der Psitech-Rabe verlieren das {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}Bewusstsein{/g}. Als letztes Geschenk regeneriert der Psitech-Rabe {uip|LoreWarpWounds|b4bc75022f36428ab86485983e796a6b} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} seines Aufsehers.
languages.original_text: This {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} is protected by their psyber-raven. When the Overseer suffers lethal damage for the first time in combat, that instance of damage is ignored and a random ally along with the psyber-raven fall {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g} instead. As a final gift, the psyber-raven restores {uip|LoreWarpWounds|b4bc75022f36428ab86485983e796a6b} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} to its Overseer.

traits.locale_text: Dieser Aufseher wird von seinem Psitech-Raben beschützt. Erleidet der Aufseher im Kampf erstmals tödlichen Schaden, wird diese Schadensinstanz ignoriert und ein zufälliger Verbündeter und der Psitech-Rabe verlieren das Bewusstsein. Als letztes Geschenk regeneriert der Psitech-Rabe {uip|LoreWarpWounds|b4bc75022f36428ab86485983e796a6b} Wunden seines Aufsehers.

Erleidet der Aufseher im Kampf erstmals tödlichen Schaden, wird diese Schadensinstanz ignoriert und ein zufälliger Verbündeter und der Psitech-Rabe verlieren das Bewusstsein. Als letztes Geschenk regeneriert der Psitech-Rabe {uip|LoreWarpWounds|b4bc75022f36428ab86485983e796a6b} Wunden seines Aufsehers.
